title: Pre-School Teacher Fired After 'Kill Some Jews' Tweet
text:
2/22/2017 6:39   Icky Icky Poo • Twitter • Educational • Viral: News • Social Issues 
The Children's Courtyard may sound like the most idyllic pre-school ever, but that didn't keep it safe from controversy this week. 
A teacher at the "educational day care" center named Nancy Salem was one of 24 anti-Israeli activists found at the University Of Texas, Arlington by racism watchdog group Canary Mission . 
Her views extended to violent anti-semitic jokes on her now-deactivated Twitter , including: 
and… 
Disgusting. 
After the revelation, parents and concerned citizens posted to The Children's Courtyard Facebook page demanding Salem be fired. nd unsurprisingly it didn't take long. 
Director of Communication Lydia Cisaruk said in a statement to the press: 
"This person no longer works for our company. 
Providing a safe, nurturing and inclusive learning environment is of the utmost importance to us. The offensive comments certainly don't reflect our views. Our employees are expected to uphold certain standards of personal and professional conduct. Our senior leadership thoroughly investigated this matter." 
Maybe next time thoroughly background check your teachers? Eesh.
